settings.title: Disclaimer
settings.raw_content:
The Skiin Connected Clothing Garments are not for use by:

Persons under 18 years of age, persons using pacemakers and/or (ICD) implantable cardioverter defibrillators, and pregnant persons.

settings.title: Built for speed

Using progressive technique like image lazy-loading, code splitting, and preloading, Broadcast is the fast and nimble platform your store needs to level up. Customers are not patient, and you should not be settling for less.

settings.title: Why do you need Skiin?
settings.text:
Find more peace-of-mind by wearing Skiin and connecting to your cardiologist. By wearing Skiin, you can track your health, share your ECG with your cardiologist, log and share your symptoms, receive diagnostics, receive customized programs from your wellness team, and get support from your support network. Take control of your heart health and wellness with Skiin.

If you are a PACE patient: data collected through SKIIN will support the outpatient cardiac care you receive at PACE Cardiology. Patients must not depend on SKIIN for urgent symptom or ECG data monitoring during medical emergencies or other time sensitive matters.

settings.heading: Health & Wellness Data Skiin Can Capture
settings.text: Skiin Baseline is the first layer of the Skiin Connected Care system. Using Textile Computing, Baseline accurately capture your body’s unique health and wellness data. It captures the following health and wellness data, with more coming soon through software updates.

settings.title: Understand You
settings.text: The Skiin Connected Life App syncs your health and wellness data from your Skiin biosensing garment. Visualize your current health metrics, track changes over time, and connect to your practitioner and loved ones for care and support.

settings.title: Have a Question?
settings.text: Want to learn more about how Skiin can help you reach your health and wellness goals while connecting you to care? Visit our Help Center below.

settings.title: Select your Skiin Baseline Collection Layer
Download and connect the Skiin Connected Life App
Build a personalized dataset and visualize your Aura
Connect and communicate with your care circle

settings.heading: Getting Started
settings.text: Finding your health and wellness insights with Skiin Baseline is as easy as changing your clothes.

settings.title: The Myant // Pace Partnership
settings.description:
PACE Cardiology has partnered with Myant Inc. to help improve your heart health and wellbeing using the Skiin line of biosensing garments.

Click on the arrow below to watch the video and
learn more from the PACE Cardiology team:

settings.title: Example Customer
settings.review: Use this text to showcase a review from one of your customers. A great review is honest and speaks to the concerns of your customers.

settings.title: Skiin is a Myant brand changing how you perceive and receive care.

This partnership will help patients visualize their personal health and wellness insights, foster proactive family and PACE doctor engagement, and lead to personalized programs focused on prevention in the near future.
settings.text: This PACE program will investigate how our doctors and their Wellness Team (coming soon) can better support patients like you. During the program, your Skiin garment will help you capture your health data, connect and share your data with family members and your PACE team, and understand what activities improve your heart health and overall wellness.

settings.title: Visualize the health and wellness insights of you and your loved ones by connecting Skiin clothing to the Skiin Connected Life App. Use the app to connect to your Care Circle—your friends, family, and practitioners—so they can support you on your care journey.
Baseline
settings.text: Gain insight into your or your loved one's health and wellness over time. See what may cause a divergence from the baseline, right inside the app.

settings.title: Aura
settings.text: See your digital representation and those of your loved ones. Auras are the aggregated data including current temperature, heart rate, activity, and posture. See their vitals during messaging or video calling within the app.

settings.title: Care Circle
settings.text: Share your health and wellness data with your care circle while messaging and video calling within the app. Get the support and security of your community—anytime, anywhere.

settings.title: Baseline
settings.text:
Gain more insights into your loved one’s health and wellness through the Baseline Summary Report.

Track your loved one’s daily sleep, heart health, and more against their Baseline to unlock insights about their current wellbeing. Understand what events may have a negative or positive impact on their wellbeing.

settings.title: Aura
settings.text:
The Aura is a representation of you and your loved ones, showing you their temperature, heart rate, activity, and posture. See how your loved ones are doing at a single glance, anytime.


Connect with your loved ones like never before and view their health and wellness data in real-time with Aura integrated Messaging, Voice Call and Video Call features. See exactly how they’re doing to understand how you can better support them.

settings.title: Care Circle
settings.text:
The Skiin App connects you to the members of your Care Circle—family, friends, and practitioners—to provide continuous insights and of your health and wellness.

Quickly access biometrics of you or your loved ones on the homepage, and give or receive help when it’s needed. Connect to what matters most—your loved ones—even when you’re apart.

settings.title: Get Prescribed  & Pick Up Skiin
settings.text: Purchase Skiin at a discount through the unique link sent by PACE Cardiology. Once you select and purchase your discounted garment, Skiin will ship it directly to your home. If you opt-in to the upcoming cardiology study through your cardiologist, you can pick-up a free Skiin Chest Band (a $300 value).

settings.title: Participate in the Program
settings.text: Download the Skiin Connected Life App, and wear your garment continuously for 30 days to capture your Personal Long-Term Range—your average health over 30 days. By adding a partner to your Support Network within the app and continuing to track your health data, you are increasing your awareness and understanding of your holistic health throughout your program. Additionally, you will soon be able to share your ECG, symptoms, and general wellness metrics with your doctor.

settings.title: Purchase Additional Garments
settings.text: As you wear your Skiin garments, will realize the true benefits of continuous connection and remote monitoring! PACE patients will have access to special pricing on additional garments, and exclusive content to learn more about connected living. Sign up to our newsletter for additional information.

settings.heading:
How Will Participation in the Program
work for PACE Patients?

settings.title: Who Qualifies?
settings.text:
This program is only open to patients of the PACE Cardiology clinic, specifically those diagnosed or suspected of having cardiovascular disease, and may have a medical need for holter monitoring. No financial compensation is available, however, PACE patients who purchase a discounted Skiin garment may opt-in to an upcoming cardiology study to receive a free Skiin Chest Band (a $300 value). Learn more about the study by talking to your PACE cardiologist.

Your PACE cardiologist will determine whether you are a fit for the health and wellness monitoring program and will assemble your care team at the PACE clinic. Once prescribed, you will be provided instructions on where to pick up your Skiin Kit (including your Skiin garment(s), hardware, and a charger). This Skiin Kit contains everything you need to get started.

settings.title: How Do I Benefit?
settings.text:
For patients on a waitlist to see a cardiologist, have experienced an event and want to manage anxiety, want to prevent chronic illnesses, or want greater insight into their health and wellbeing, this program will support you on your journey. By wearing Skiin, your PACE cardiologist can monitor your resting heart rate, ECG, and more, and customize wellness programs designed for your unique needs (programs coming soon).

As a Skiin wearer, you will also enjoy exclusive content related to heart health & wellness, as well as future updates and upcoming features within The Skiin Connected Life App. Check out our App Page for more info.

settings.heading: Biometrics That Skiin Can Capture
settings.text: The built-in chat features in the app lets you have meaningful face-to-face video conversations with your loved ones along with their live biometric data.

settings.title: Slip & Fall
settings.text: Send out an alert and call your loved ones after a slip and fall, even when you can’t reach your phone.

settings.title: Enhanced Aura Communication
settings.text: Chat over voice or video using the Aura overlay to share your health and wellness data.

settings.title: New Biosignals
settings.text: Upcoming biosignals include ECG, Stress, Blood Pressure, Sleep Phases, Calorie Expenditure, Bioimpedance, EMG, and EEG.

settings.title: Event Tracking
settings.text: Add various events and activities to track against your baseline to understand what positively or negatively affects your health and wellbeing.

settings.title: Download the Skiin Connected Life App
settings.text:
The Skiin Connected Life App connects you to your Care Circle: your family, friends, and practitioners.

Quickly access health and wellness data of you or your loved ones on the homepage, and give or receive help when it’s needed. Chat over text, voice, or video and use the Aura overlay to share your health and wellness data. Connect to what matters most—your loved ones—even when you’re apart.

settings.title: As Myant’s consumer-centred brand, we are led by the visionary Tony Chahine and backed with a powerhouse team committed to developing connected textiles that transform people’s lives. To learn more about Myant and how to partner with us, visit Myant.ca.
Why Textiles?
settings.text:
Textiles have, since the beginning, been inextricably linked to humanity.

No other element in our lives provides such universal coverage: nearly 100 percent of the population, nearly 100 percent of the time, and nearly 100 percent of the body’s real estate.

Textiles allow technology to be easily incorporated in our daily lives allowing us to improve our health and wellness by doing something we do every day – get dressed.

settings.title: Powered by Skiin
settings.text:
What is possible in a world where textiles can sense, anticipate and react?

Discover how health, performance and work all change when everyday textiles in your environment that are Powered by Skiin connected to the Myant Platform. Visit Myant.ca

settings.title:
Skiin is not a wearable device— it’s a care system that
connects you to your loved ones and your practitioner.
Knitting the Circle of Care Closer Together

settings.text: Imagine a healthcare platform that allows you to proactively manage your health from the comfort of your home, regardless of where you live. Knowing that you are connected to your family near and far gives you and your loved ones peace of mind, and can ease your worries about living with a serious health condition. Myant’s Digital Health Platform helps you do just that by providing you with care on your terms—when you need it.

settings.title: Faster Connection
settings.text: No more waiting months just to be seen by your cardiologist.

settings.title: Empowerment
settings.text: Develop an ongoing relationship with your health and the health of your loved ones.

settings.title: Remote Patient Monitoring
settings.text: Receive access to the best cardiologists remotely, who will interpret your symptom logs, ECG, and other biomarkers when a problem arises.

settings.title: Symptom Logging
settings.text: Never miss a symptom or worry about delays in dealing with a health concern or condition.

settings.title: Virtual Health Consultations
settings.text: Receive video consultations with your Cardiologist right from within the app. Your cardiologist will then review your previously-reported symptom logs, ECG, and other biometric data—a virtual snapshot of your health at the time an event occurs.

settings.title: Family Monitoring
settings.text: Gain peace of mind knowing that your loved ones are continuously connected to you. Reduce anxiety by engaging your family for their support.

settings.title: Wellness
settings.text: Supports home-based cardiac rehabilitation and wellness  programs. Receive a personalised care plan to help establish healthy behaviours, increase adherence to rehabilitation programs, and improve overall health outcomes.

settings.html:
How does it work?


  • Purchase a Skiin Chest Band Kit and start wearing Skiin.

  • Download the Skiin Connected Life App and log symptoms in the app’s Diary feature.

  • Each time you log a symptom your Cardiologist will be notified. These symptom logs are accompanied by your ECG and related biomarkers and help provide your Cardiologist with a clearer view of your cardiac health.

  • Your clinic will contact you to book a follow-up appointment, should it be warranted.

  • Share your health data with your family to receive greater support.

  • Rehabilitation and Coaching services to support your recovery or health goals are available right in the virtual clinic and delivered by experts who tailor a program to your needs.

settings.text: Multi-lead ECG, Heart Rate, HRV, RHR: Manage your heart health and passively collect live ECG for screening & diagnosis with your cardiologist.
Steps, Posture, Activity and Location: Track activity and set daily reminders to help you reach your activity goals.

Baseline: Establish your personal baseline, which represents your past and current health states and trends. Your Baseline Report serves as a starting point that allows you to understand your unique health and wellness, and track any deviations in your health over time.
Body temperature: Detect changes in core body temperature when your body is working harder than it should.
Respiration Rate: Track changes in your Respiration Rate over time. An increased respiration rate may indicate that your body is fighting an illness.
Sleep: Your sleep can play a vital role in your overall health. By monitoring your sleeping patterns you can track trends and changes in your health over time.

Myant was founded with the purpose of making healthcare more equitable, accessible, and efficient. We exist to ensure that all people are active participants in their own health and the health of those they care for.

settings.title: Welcome to Connected Care & Improved Cardiovascular Health
settings.text:
Myant is changing the way we connect with one another and redefining how we care for our loved ones. As patients and caregivers, we understand the importance of staying connected to our families and healthcare practitioners. No matter where you live, we strive to provide the tools and means for the best possible outcomes for all patients through continuous monitoring
and personalised care delivery systems.

Myant’s Digital Health Platform uses Skiin Undergarments*
to keep patients connected with their circle of care,
especially in times when care and support are needed most.

settings.footer-note:
* Skiin Undergarment products are trademarked and Health Canada licensed under
the medical device group family name “Skiin Underwear”.
